data.text: @YossiGestetner @MichaelPSenger @kerpen Everything MichaelPSenger said is TRUE. Twitter does not own the truth. The Covid public health policies were disastrous.
@YossiGestetner @MichaelPSenger @kerpen They got to him, huh? I've been reading a lot of his tweets. He was spot on, imho.
Joke is I tweeted to Michael that people are still being suspended for saying what he said. And... He got suspended. https://t.co/lTV5SnnXWe
@YossiGestetner @MichaelPSenger @kerpen Needs an explanation since SARS-COV-2 was identified as being close genetically to old SARS.

@YossiGestetner @MichaelPSenger @kerpen Well, you know that old SARS has only managed to infect around 10,000 worldwide and MERS only infected around 100,000.  SARS killed about 10% of those infected by SARS, and MERS 50%, the opposite of SARS-COV-2--infected millions, killed millions, smaller kill rate.
@YossiGestetner Fauci should be fired AFTER he is indicted
@YossiGestetner @heather_truth @MichaelPSenger @kerpen Covid polices weâ€™re changed because elections are coming up soon and they are worried about losing their jobs

Many Cons wrote tweets/articles recently that they want apologies from Fauci, etc for being wrong in so many ways.

Haha. None of these clowns think they are frauds. They think they handled it fine and changed rules due to a drop in cases; not due to seeing how wrong they were.
